name: Art of Murder - The Secret Files
description: While working in Mexico and aiding in the fight against the Mexican drug cartels, DEA Specialist Professor J. Brenner was kidnapped by the cartel after an undercover Special Agent was murdered. Help Nicole Bonnet to uncover the clues and solve the case behind the terrible murder and kidnapping.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, Intel Pentium D 2.66 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce (6800/7600-7950/8600-8800/9600-9800/GTX 260-280) or Radeon (X1650-1950/HD2400-2900/3650-3870/4650-4870) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, Intel Pentium D 2.66 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce (6800/7600-7950/8600-8800/9600-9800/GTX 260-280) or Radeon (X1650-1950/HD2400-2900/3650-3870/4650-4870) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
